channel.title: D8 on Geert van Dort
channel.description: Recent content in D8 on Geert van Dort

item.title: Exclude config from configuration management in Drupal 8
item.description: Drupal 8 makes it really easy to export and import your entire configuration, which makes it easily deployable on all your environments. However, this is not always desirable when a customer controls part of that configuration. Let’s take the webform module as an example. Webforms are configuration entities in drupal 8, this means that they are automatically exported when doing a config-export. It also means that webforms which have not been exported will be removed during config-import.
